welcomeText: My name is Çağatay Çalışkan, and I work as a Front-end Developer. I was born in Turkey in 1998 and graduated from Anadolu University with a degree in Aviation Management. I have a strong passion for software development and enjoy learning new technologies. I focus on delivering the best solutions in the projects I work on, prioritizing user experience and performance. I believe in continuous learning and strive to create innovative and impactful projects.
